message: Let's start fair. I'll take the bigger share, but you get something too!
Your turn Alice. I'm proposing a more reasonable split. This offer won't last forever!
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 70/30 this time.  If you reject this, I'll be forced to take a bigger share next round!
Alice, let's be realistic. This offer is fair and saves us both from losing out to inflation. Time is running out!
